channel.title: I need help with a few things making your admin if you help
channel.description:
my servers way to laggy so can some1 tell me how to make a timer eg when you click a door it says please w8 2 secs,im not talking about message i just want less lagg when you die you dissconect got ne tips??? how i change port ???
thx alot :cool:

item.title: I need help with a few things making your admin if you help
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

To change the port go into server.java and find 43594 and change that to the port you wanna use and if your port that you have already isn’t 43594 search for

serverlistenerPort

And change the port to whatever you want to add a timer to a door I’m gonna use a hitdoor void as an example

Search for public void hitdoor() in client.java and then under the void you will see

//if(actionTimer == 0)

Remove the // and change the 0 to the seconds you want them to wait[br][size=1]Posted on: April 23, 2007, 12:36:33 AM[/size][hr]And the disconnecting when dying is probaly something to do with you isdead void or something I’m not sure

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with a few things making your admin if you help
